cz.cuni.mff.kocur.base

Class IndentationStringBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.base.CustomStringBuilder
      • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.base.IndentationStringBuilder

  • public class IndentationStringBuilder
extends CustomStringBuilder
    This class extends CustomStringBuilder and defines methods for adding indentation for lines I am adding. You can add a few lines, increase the indent, add few more, decrease the indent. This helps a lot when creating some text output that should be indented.
    Author:
    kocur
